1.content: Who is the main character to focus on?
1.title: Welcome to Dragon Land.

11.content:
What is gonna happen to
Emmy?
11.title: Emmy

choices: Emmy makes a wish that goes wrong. She keeps getting bigger and bigger
Accidental spill. Emmy and the crate of Enlarging Dust! Emmy’s Growth spurts!
111.content:
How does Emma grow bigger?
( note like the Max path her clothes must grow too )
111.title: Emmy grows Big ( GTS/Taller )

12.content: What's going to happen to Max?
12.title: Max

choices: He makes a wish on a wishing well and keeps getting bigger and bigger.
He uses a potion that makes him grow and grow.
121.content: How does Max grow bigger? (Note: ALL of his clothes MUST survive the growth!!!)
121.title: He grows bigger.

choices: He's mad about being short again and doesn't want to go back to normal.
He usually has fantasies about being a giant.
1211.content: Why does he want to be bigger?
1211.title: He makes a wish on a wishing well and keeps get...

choices: He's mad about being short again and doesn't want to go back to normal.
He usually has fantasies about being a giant.
1212.content: Why does he want to be bigger?
1212.title: He uses a potion that makes him grow and grow.

choices: He's being adopted by the dragons. Something happened to his human family.
He was accidentally hit by something magical that's transforming him.
It's only temporary, Quetzal has the means for this to happen.
122.content: Okay, why is Max becoming a Dragon?
122.title: He becomes a dragon

choices: He's getting adopted and transformed alone.
He and Emmy are getting adopted and transformed together.
All three of the kids are getting adopted and transformed.
1221.content: Okay, so the dragons are transforming Max into a dragon to adopt him. Is he the only one getting transformed to be adopted, or is Emmy and/or Enrique getting transformed and adopted with him?
1221.title: He's being adopted by the dragons.

choices: Ord's Mom plan's to adopt him.
Cassie's mom is planning to adopt him.
Zak and Wezzie's mom plans to adopt him.
Another dragon mom plans to adopt Max.
12211.content:
Okay, so Max is getting transformed and adopted into one of the dragon families by himself. Something had happened with his human family. (Which will be left to the reader's imagination.)

So, which dragon family is planning to adopt Max?
12211.title: He's getting adopted and transformed alone.

choices: His age regress. Possibly to the point of a dragon egg ready to hatch.
No, he's stays his original age.
122112.content:
Okay, Cassie's mom, whom we will call Rhea for the sake of the interactive, is the one adopting Max while he's being transformed. He'll be her 74th child if I remember correctly.

Now, here is a question, before we continue to go deeper into this scenario. Will Max be regressed as he his turned into a dragon? Or will he remain the same age, around Cassie's age, maybe a year younger?
122112.title: Cassie's mom is planning to adopt him.

choices: It's been a few hours. Rhea's holding him in her arms. He's already diapered up.
It had been a few days, and he was now a baby dragon hatchling.
He woke up in some place dark and cramped. He had yet to hatch.
1221121.content:
So, Rhea had agreed to adopt Max into her family of 73 children, making him number 74. Max was okay with this, because, even though he and Ord were best friends, Rhea had been like a second mother to him when he had come to Dragon Land for sleepovers. She sometimes even stated she wished she could have cared for him all the time.

Now she was gonna get her wish, and Max was gonna get a big loving family. Quetzal had given Max a potion, and stated that the effects were not gonna be immediate, but would show up in their entirety in a few days. Not long after taking the potion, Max had passed out in Rhea's arms, due to the potion's effects. Quetzal had told Rhea that the potion would reverse max's age to sometime of being a hatchling, and may even have him reverted back to when a dragon is in an egg, so his ability to know when to go, might be lost very soon. Rhea agreed that she would have Max in protective padding, and would explain the situation to Max when he woke up.

Soon Rhea gently place Max into her pouch where he slept snug and soundly, and flew off with Cassie to their family cave.

When max awoke........
1221121.title: His age regress.

1224.content: Did Cassie turn Max into a dragon because she has a crash on him?
1224.title: Reader's choice

125.content: What else going to happen to Max?
125.title: Something else

14.content: What going to happen to Cassie?
14.title: Cassie

145.content: What else going to happen to Cassie?
145.title: Something else

1452.content: Who does Cassie conjoined with?
1452.title: She conjoined with someone

info.brief_description: Join your favorite kids and their dragon friends in your own all new adventures!
info.description:
Just follow The rules.

1. keep it clean.
2. Zak and Wheezie can either conjoined or seperated dragons.
3. Nothing rude.
4. Every chapter must be appropriate.
5. No Weight gain.
6. Max and Emmy can become dragons or become a two headed dragon.
7. Have great grammar.
8. Never end the story.
9. Keep it going.
10. Have fun and welcome to dragon land!
